info.title: Rapidata Validation API
info.description: The API for the Rapidata Validation service

get.summary: Queries available validation sets based on the provided filter, paging and sorting criteria.

parameters.name: model
parameters.description: The model containing the query parameters.

get.summary: Gets a validation set that is available to the user and best matches the provided parameters.
get.description: This is not a hard filter, instead it is used to find validation sets that have similar characteristics to the provided instruction.

parameters.name: assetType
parameters.description:
The types of assets that the validation set should contain.
 An asset type can be an image, video, audio, text, or any combination of these.
 
 This parameter is a flag, meaning that it can be null or contain multiple values.
 If multiple values are provided, a validation set will be chosen that contains at least one of the specified asset types.

parameters.name: modality
parameters.description:
The rapid modalities that the validation set should contain.
 The modality is the type of rapid such as classify, compare, locate, etc.
 
 This parameter is a flag, meaning that it can be null or contain multiple values.
 If multiple values are provided, a validation set will be chosen that contains at least one of the specified modalities.

parameters.name: promptType
parameters.description:
The prompt types that the validation set should contain.
 A prompt type is the additional information that is presented to the user when solving a rapid.
 For example, a prompt type can be either text or an asset if the context is an image or video.
 
 This parameter is a flag, meaning that it can be null or contain multiple values.
 If multiple values are provided, a validation set will be chosen that contains at least one of the specified prompt types.

parameters.name: instruction
parameters.description:
An instruction that can be used to filter for validation sets that have similar instructions.
 An instruction is a text that is presented to the user when solving a rapid that explains how to solve the rapid.

delete.summary: Gets a validation set by the id.

parameters.name: validationSetId
parameters.description: The id of the validation set to get.

get.summary: Gets a validation set by the id.

parameters.name: validationSetId
parameters.description: The id of the validation set to get.

patch.summary: Updates different characteristics of a validation set.

parameters.name: validationSetId
parameters.description: The Id of the validation set to update the dimensions for.

requestBody.description: The body request for updating the shouldAlert property.

get.summary: Gets the available validation sets for the current user.

post.summary: Creates a new empty validation set.

requestBody.description: The body request for creating a new validation set.

get.summary: Queries the validation rapids for a specific validation set.

parameters.name: model
parameters.description: The request formatted as a JSON in the query parameters.

post.summary: Adds a new validation rapid to the validation set using JSON body.

parameters.name: validationSetId
parameters.description: The validation set to add a rapid to.

requestBody.description: The validation rapid data including asset, payload, and metadata.

post.summary: Refreshes the labeling hints for a validation set.
post.description: This will sample the rapids in the validation set and update the labeling hints based on the sampled rapids.

parameters.name: validationSetId
parameters.description: The id of the validation set to update the labeling hints for.

patch.summary: Updates the visibility of a validation set.
patch.description: Public validation sets are used to automatically add a validation set to an order if no validation set is specified.

parameters.name: validationSetId
parameters.description: The id of the validation set to update the visibility for.

parameters.name: isPublic
parameters.description: Whether the validation set should be public or private.

patch.summary: Updates the dimensions of all rapids within a validation set.

parameters.name: validationSetId
parameters.description: The Id of the validation set to update the dimensions for.

requestBody.description: The body request for updating the dimensions.

patch.summary: Updates the dimensions of all rapids within a validation set.

parameters.name: validationSetId
parameters.description: The Id of the validation set to update the dimensions for.

requestBody.description: The body request for updating the shouldAlert property.

get.summary: Exports all rapids of a validation-set to a file.

asset.description: The asset to use for the rapid.

payload.description: The payload to use for the rapid.

truth.description: The ground truth for the rapid.

randomCorrectProbability.description: The probability for an answer to be correct when randomly guessing.

explanation.description: An explanation for the users if they answer the rapid incorrectly.

context.description: An optional textual context that provides additional information to the user about the rapid.

contextAsset.description: An optional asset that provides additional context to the user about the rapid.

featureFlags.description: The feature flags to enable for the rapid.

AddValidationRapidModel.description: The model for adding a validation rapid with asset in JSON body.

name.description: The name of the validation set.

CreateValidationSetModel.description: The body request for creating a new validation set.

dimensions.description: The dimensions to set on all rapids within the validation set.

UpdateDimensionsModel.description: The model for updating the dimensions of all rapids within a validation set.

shouldAlert.description: A flag indicating whether the users should be alerted if they answer incorrectly.

UpdateShouldAlertModel.description: The model for updating the shouldAlert field of all rapids within a validation set.

name.description: The name of the validation set

dimensions.description: The dimensions of the validation set

shouldAlert.description: If the user should be alerted or not

isPublic.description: If the validation set is public

isFlagOverruled.description: If the flag on validation rapids should be overruled

UpdateValidationSetModel.description: Allows for specific updates to a validation set without needing to provide all properties.

Bearer.description: JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme

OAuth2.description: OAuth2 authorization header using the Bearer scheme
